pageProduct.name: Allens Anticol 3x10 Lozenge Multipack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

ANTICOL medicated throat lozenges work fast to clear the nose and soothe the throat.
Proudly made in Australia, ANTICOL medicated throat lozenges contain active ingredients Menthol, Eucalyptus Oil and Vitamin C, and no artificial colours.
Each pack contains 30 individually wrapped lozenges, conveniently packed in 3 sticks of 10, perfect to take on-the-go.

Each medicated lozenge with its red centre and extra strong menthol works rapidly to clear nasal congestion and make breathing easier, while also soothing sore throats. Each medicated lozenge contains the active ingredients Menthol, Eucalyptus Oil and Vitamin C.

Size: 3 x 10 Multipack

Serving Size: 20g

Ingredients

Each lozenge contains: Active ingredients: MENTHOL 12mg, EUCALYPTUS OIL 3mg, SODIUM ASCORBATE 11.24mg (Equiv to Vitamin C 10mg). Also contains: Sugars. Vitamins can only be of assistance if the dietary vitamin intake is inadequate.

Allergen Contains: Wheat

Directions

Use ANTICOL to: Relieve sore throats & clear the nose.

How to use ANTICOL: Slowly dissolve a lozenge in the mouth as required. Do not exceed a dose of 20 lozenges for Adults and 10 lozenges for children under 12 years in 24 hours. Not suitable for children under 6 years of age without medical advice. Do not use if pack is damaged or appears to be tampered with.

Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms perist talk to your health care professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a dry place.
